entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 6:33 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:33 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
